thread.title: What has happened to respect?
thread.title_full: What has happened to respect? | News24

author: news24.com
title: What has happened to respect?
text:
What has happened to respect? I see a student in High School takes umbrage that there are rules regarding length of his hair!
Police are being taken out and shot in cold blood - students riot and set fire to vehicles and buildings. We (In my time) had utmost respect for our teachers and took pride in following school rules - we looked up to and admired the teachers - we looked up to and respected the police.
Those at university gave thanks to their parents or had bursaries (if they were smart enough) to go to Varsity - by spending long hours studying.
Today they throw human waste around to make a point, put burning tyres around necks.
Rape 3 year olds and 93 year olds. What has happened to the morals of our people? Today!!!
